snippet.textDisplay: That last message was the only one that was dumb. This isn't going to end soon. Prepare to be careful for the next 18 months. The effects will be reduced if we use draconical social distancing and social isolation. If we don't, 10 million people could die. If we do the estimate is that 4000 people will die. We're already past that. Here in Sweden, our government still denies this being worse than the flu. Don't for a second think they are stupid though. They're putting the economy and the housing bubble (which they're all heavily invested in) before lives and they'd love to see the older generation die off so they won't have to pay their pensions (which they can't pay anyway because the socialist system never can nor will work). Pure evil. This is what happens when we trust the government to take care of us. Idiocy. Hopefully this will wake a lot of people up.

snippet.textDisplay: In Australia we have just commenced shut down of all Restaurants, Cafes, Clubs, Pubs, Indoor sports facilities, Churches/Worship, Gyms, Cinemas, Casinos, Major beaches, half the states have closed their state lines. Business that are affected will be given government grants and any people out of work are eligible to apply for job seeking assistance without much red tape. All major banks have frozen loan payments for the next 6 months. This has cost $166bn and will continue to grow... and yes we are listening and a big Thanks to China.

snippet.textDisplay:
Containment is not staying in front of the internet or series, listening to music. It's time to come closer to God, to pray, to invoke him, to reflect on our actions and what we have done with our lives, in what state we have put the planet ... This is the time to beg his forgiveness and repent otherwise he may send us something worse than covid_19.

Il contenimento non sta di fronte a Internet o alle serie, ascoltando musica. È tempo di avvicinarsi a Dio, di pregare, di invocarlo, di riflettere sulle nostre azioni e su ciò che abbiamo fatto della nostra vita, in quale stato abbiamo messo il pianeta ... Questo è il momento per chiedere perdono e pentirsi, altrimenti potrebbe inviarci qualcosa di peggio di covid_19.

Le confinement ce n'est pas rester devant internet ou des series, ecouter de la musique. C'est le moment de se rapprocher de Dieu, de prier, de l'invoquer, de réfléchir à nos actes et ce que nous avons fait de nos vies, dans quel état nous avons mis la planète... C'est le moment de supplier son pardon et de se repentir sinon il pourra nous envoyer quelque chose de pire que le covid_19.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
To cure a person's ignorance, to see is to believe! It isn't hitting the bickerers here yet, that's why they say "it is just a flu and flu kills more people every year than this one". Yeah, it is a "flu", but look at how things are increasing- 200k+ people may be just a tiny part of 7 billion humans- but can you understand how exponential increase works in math? Well, let's just wait until they get it as they ignorantly try to beat the odds of not being a part of that 4.09% (virus death rate as of 3/20) because they say they aren't elderly.

snippet.textDisplay:
Some interesting facts about Italy's deaths...

99% were people with previous medical conditions...average age of those who died was 79.5....17 people under 50 died from the virus...all victims under 40 were males with serious medical conditions.

No doubt a serious situation, but this video is misleading and the people not fully informed.

https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-03-18/99-of-those-who-died-from-virus-had-other-illness-italy-says

snippet.textDisplay:
As an American, the damage Trump did by calling this pandemic a hoax for a month is going to be nearly impossible to undo. Tens of millions of people listened to him, and now those people are going to continue to go out in public and not take this seriously. We had a chance to be prepared for this, but Trump screwed it up royally.



Now some states are trying to take measures to slow it down, but without a unified response at the federal level this won't slow down. I only hope we can make people take this seriously before it's too late.
snippet.textOriginal:
As an American, the damage Trump did by calling this pandemic a hoax for a month is going to be nearly impossible to undo. Tens of millions of people listened to him, and now those people are going to continue to go out in public and not take this seriously. We had a chance to be prepared for this, but Trump screwed it up royally. 



Now some states are trying to take measures to slow it down, but without a unified response at the federal level this won't slow down. I only hope we can make people take this seriously before it's too late.

snippet.textOriginal:
Hello everyone. If any of you has important information, photos or videos they would like to share with the world about how COVID19 is being handled in their country we're making this channel available as a platform to share it with everyone. You can email us directly at: athingby@gmail.com

Stay safe everyone.
A THING BY

snippet.textDisplay:
Hilarious, a bunch of healthy people paid to spread fear for an agenda. Where are the sick people telling us how bad this sh*t is? I just received a shipment of tools from Italy, I don't think it's as shut down as what's being reported. Here's the agenda, this is the test of communism. First, break the economy through fear by making people stay at home. Once the economy tanks, mandate health care because you just convinced millions of stupid people that the potential for COVID-19 is far more serious than the flu despite the factual numbers. Because the healthcare system is greedy and too expensive, promise that they'll be taken care of in the future and they'll need FORCED healthcare. This will be through forcing vaccinations, forcing expensive health insurance, etc. That's one level of control. You know, grease the wheels of dr's, hospitals, and insurance companies. Then, because no one's job will actually be able to afford this sh*t in a bad economy, make the sheep even more dependent by creating social programs that you'll have to be tied to. Suddenly we'll all be tied to the tit of governments world wide.

Here's the real deal, get exposed to the illness and become immune to it and move on. If you don't get immunity to it, the next transformation of this virus will be even worse and you will definitely not be able to handle it. Besides that, anyone ever question why all of this sh*t comes from China anyway? Isn't it odd that the last two "pandemics" have come from there?

snippet.textDisplay: Until last Sunday, March 15, 2020, NYC Mayor didn't want to close the schools because he said New Yorkers don't scare easily and 1 out of 9 students need the school for their meals. He is willing to put at risk and in harms way 9 students so that 1 student can eat at school. New Yorkers are taking the Convid-19 seriously and have been urging the mayor to close the schools but the mayor refused with that lame excuse of "don't scare easily" and "1 out of 9 students need to eat in their school." I hope this mayor get booted out of office next election.

snippet.textDisplay: Im seeing a lot of china hate. And sure it's fine to blame china for the sickness and deaths. But you dont mind buying China's plastics, metals and pharmaceuticals from factories that pollute their air and give people respiratory problems. You demand these items. You buy your phones not caring about the suicides occuring at the factories that make them. Dont like the virus? Dont give them your money then and demand imported items that could be covered in virus. Maybe that's how it got to your country in the first place!

snippet.textDisplay:
Number of General Hospitals in the United States: 6,146
Number of Confirmed COVID Patients: 6,800.

There's only slightly a little more than 1 patient with COVID per hospital. But, the Media is telling us that the system is already nearing capacity and being strained from the Cases. 1 extra patient is straining a hospital? I think not. Clearly, just like with the 1918 Spanish Flu, governments of the world are hiding the severity of this. They don't want people to panic, or other nations to know how sick they are. So they're getting the media to lie.

This is probably FAR worse than the Italians even think it is. Iran didn't build a mass grave you can see from space over just 600 deaths.

snippet.textDisplay:
I have a friend who is angry with me for not going to see them this past weekend.
If I had, I would have been denied entry to a hospital that I had an appointment at on Monday. They were barring anyone who had traveled anywhere (out of state) at all for the past two weeks. Only if you needed emergency care would you be allowed in the door if you had traveled anywhere at all in the past two weeks.
I went to the grocery afterwards to make sure there was enough food in the house for at least another two weeks because my state had declared a state of emergency the day before when we had confirmed cases that were still in the single digits. I washed my hands & put on gloves before touching anything in the store. So far, my state has less than 20 confirmed cases (at least, as of about 5pm today) but I was SHOCKED at the number of people not taking ANY precautions whatsoever.
People really need to take this thing seriously because from last Thursday to yesterday, the number of fatalities that are confirmed to have been a result of this disease more than doubled--in fact, it nearly tripled just in four days. This is not "just the flu" and it's not a joke.

snippet.textDisplay: Look I appreciate the messages from Italians in Italy, but really all it is doing is making those of us who know how to deal with infectious diseases feel stupid. Nor do we need or want anyone causing more panic by spreading false information about Covid-19. The disease is preventable, by washing your hands for 20 seconds or more, and by showing some simple basic manners like not coughing or sneezing on people and instead by covering your mouth and nose with a cloth or the elbow of a long sleeved shirt. Nor do you need to run around wearing a face mask on your face 24/7, as that is the last thing you should do. Yes wearing a face mask if you are sick will help prevent spreading the disease, but it still needs to be changed regularly. These are simple basic things you learn when working in a Hospital, or other medical institution to control and reduce the risk of infection among people who's immune system is weakened. It also helps reduce cross contamination, so yes American's know how do deal with such things. But you still cannot stop stupid, from doing stupid things like taking unnecessary risk like trying to use a female hygiene product (sanitary napkin aka Maxi pad) as a medical face mask.
